data_table.description: EDIC. Laboratory data of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC follow-up year

variable.name: ABVAL3
variable.description: Lipid-serum creatinine (mg/dl)

variable.name: ABVAL21
variable.description: Lipid-total cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: ABVAL22
variable.description: Lipid-triglyceride (mg/dl)

variable.name: ABVAL23
variable.description: Lipid-HDL cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: ABVAL24
variable.description: Lipid-LDL cholesterol (mg/dl)

variable.name: ABCLD3
variable.description: De-identified lipid collection date

variable.name: BAVAL12
variable.description: Four hours ren-serum albumin (g/dl)

variable.name: BAVAL13
variable.description: Four hours ren-serum creatinine (mg/dl)

variable.name: BAVAL14
variable.description: Four hours ren-urine albumin (mg/l)

variable.name: BAVAL15
variable.description: Four hours ren-albumin excretion (ug/min)

variable.name: BAVAL16
variable.description: Four hours ren-urine creatinine (mg/dl)

variable.name: BAVAL17
variable.description: Four hours ren-height (cm)

variable.name: BAVAL18
variable.description: Four hours ren-weight (kg)

variable.name: BAVAL19
variable.description: Four hours ren-raw clearance (ml/min)

variable.name: BAVAL20A
variable.description: Four hours ren-standard clearance (/1.73 m2)

variable.name: BAVAL20B
variable.description: Four hours ren-duration (hours)

variable.name: BAVAL20C
variable.description: Four hours ren-volume (ml)

variable.name: BACLD12
variable.description: De-identified renal collection date

variable.name: BOURINEB
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-background

variable.name: BOURINE1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-t1

variable.name: BOURINE2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-t2

variable.name: BOURINE3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-t3

variable.name: BOURINE4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-t4

variable.name: BOURINE5
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: urine-t5

variable.name: BOSERUMB
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-background

variable.name: BOSERUM0
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t0

variable.name: BOSERUM1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t1

variable.name: BOSERUM2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t2

variable.name: BOSERUM3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t3

variable.name: BOSERUM4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t4

variable.name: BOSERUM5
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) raw count: serum-t5

variable.name: BOSGLUCB
variable.description: Serum glucose PRE (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC0
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 0 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC1
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 1 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC2
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 2 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC3
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 3 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC4
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 4 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOSGLUC5
variable.description: Serum glucose-t 5 (mg/dl)

variable.name: BOHEIGHT
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) height (cm)

variable.name: BOWEIGHT
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) weight (kg)

variable.name: BOUTIMT0
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-time: t-0

variable.name: BOUTIMT1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-time: t-1

variable.name: BOUTIMT2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-time: t-2

variable.name: BOUTIMT3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-time: t-3

variable.name: BOUTIMT4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-time: t-4

variable.name: BOVOLT1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-volume: t-1

variable.name: BOVOLT2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-volume: t-2

variable.name: BOVOLT3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-volume: t-3

variable.name: BOVOLT4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine-volume: t-4

variable.name: BOSC0
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) serum count diff: baseline to t-0

variable.name: BOSC1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) serum count diff: baseline to t-1

variable.name: BOSC2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) serum count diff: baseline to t-2

variable.name: BOSC3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) serum count diff: baseline to t-3

variable.name: BOSC4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) serum count diff: baseline to t-4

variable.name: BOUC1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine count diff: t-0 to t-1 sample

variable.name: BOUC2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine count diff: t-0 to t-2 sample

variable.name: BOUC3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine count diff: t-0 to t-3 sample

variable.name: BOUC4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) urine count diff: t-0 to t-4 sample

variable.name: BOETIME1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) elapsed time from t-0 to t-1 sample

variable.name: BOETIME2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) elapsed time from t-1 to t-2 sample

variable.name: BOETIME3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) elapsed time from t-2 to t-3 sample

variable.name: BOETIME4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) elapsed time from t-3 to t-4 sample

variable.name: BOV1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) flow (ml/min): t-0 to t-1 sample

variable.name: BOV2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) flow (ml/min): t-1 to t-2 sample

variable.name: BOV3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) flow (ml/min): t-2 to t-3 sample

variable.name: BOV4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) flow (ml/min): t-3 to t-4 sample

variable.name: BOPP1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) -log transf.-serum count diff (t-0-1)

variable.name: BOPP2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) -log transf.-serum count diff (t-1-2)

variable.name: BOPP3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) -log transf.-serum count diff (t-2-3)

variable.name: BOPP4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) -log transf.-serum count diff (t-3-4)

variable.name: BOBSA
variable.description: Ger. body surface area: uses body weight and height

variable.name: BOGFR_U1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) unadjusted 1st time period

variable.name: BOGFR_U2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) unadjusted 2nd time period

variable.name: BOGFR_U3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) unadjusted 3rd time period

variable.name: BOGFR_U4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) unadjusted 4th time period

variable.name: BOGFR_UX
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) unadjusted mean (time periods 1-4)

variable.name: BOGFR_A1
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) adjusted 1st time period

variable.name: BOGFR_A2
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) adjusted 2nd time period

variable.name: BOGFR_A3
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) adjusted 3rd time period

variable.name: BOGFR_A4
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) adjusted 4th time period

variable.name: BOGFR_AX
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) adjusted mean (time periods 1-4)

variable.name: BOGFRCV
variable.description: GFR (glomerular filtration rate) coefficient of variation

variable.name: BOCLD
variable.description: De-identified GFR (glomerular filtration rate) collection date

variable.name: DORESULT
variable.description: HbA1c (glycosylated hemoglobin A1c) results (%)

variable.name: DOCLD
variable.description: De-identified HbA1c (glycosylated hemoglobin A1c) collection date

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: De-identified patient ID
